amenities: Beds: Depending on the cottage, queen/twin setups

Toilets: Private western-style or shared facilities in dorms

Linens: Simple linens provided; extra blankets on request

Hot water: Potable hot water available outside each cottage block
Cleaning: Strict hygiene standards with regular maintenance
